name: Recovery Works London
description: Comprehensive addiction treatment center providing residential inpatient care, detox programs, and outpatient services for substance use disorders. Offers evidence-based treatment including medication-assisted treatment (MAT), individual and group counseling, family therapy, 12-step programs, and dual diagnosis care. Part of Pinnacle Treatment Centers network with CARF accreditation. Located in scenic Daniel Boone National Forest area.
source: Verified from official website and multiple authoritative sources
hours_of_operation: Residential Facility: 24/7, 365 days per year; Administrative: Monday-Friday 8:30 AM-5:00 PM
eligibility: Adults 18+ with substance use disorders; accepts most insurance including Medicaid and Medicare
fees: Accepts most commercial insurance, Medicaid, Medicare, and self-pay options
notes: CARF accredited facility. Open access - accepts patients seven days a week. Offers comprehensive continuum of care with specialized therapies for opioid addiction. Provides transportation assistance and case management services.
